弯刃大刀（Falchion）：基本上即为须双手持用的弯刀，它的弯刃十分锋利。 双头连枷（Flail, Dire）：这是双头武器。

list.abs: conclusion Think we can use minisize falchion concerting Chinese traditional medicine to degenerate lumbar osteoarthritis . this method can cause mescence and acesodyne to ease or cure this disease .结论：退行性腰椎骨关节炎用微型刀配合中药外敷治疗，能起到消肿止痛，达到减轻或治愈疾病的目的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English fauchon, from Old French, based on Latin falx, falc- 'sickle'. The -l- was added in the 16th cent. to conform with the Latin spelling

means.word_mean: 1. a short broad slightly convex medieval sword with a sharp point
